LOGIN.USER_GUIDE_HINT_3: and agree to comply with the platform's regulations.
LOGIN.REGISTER_CONTENT: This username will be applied to your device.

USER_CODE.TITLE: User Code of Conduct
USER_CODE.1_CONTENT: This User Code of Conduct aims to ensure a safe, friendly, and efficient environment for all users on this platform.
USER_CODE.2_1_CONTENT: Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations and must not engage in any illegal activities using this platform.
USER_CODE.2_2_CONTENT: Users should provide accurate and truthful information and must not impersonate others or make false statements.
USER_CODE.2_3_CONTENT: Users should respect the rights and dignity of others and must not post content that is insulting, discriminatory, or defamatory.
USER_CODE.3_1_CONTENT: Users are responsible for the security of their accounts and should keep their passwords confidential and not share their accounts with others.
USER_CODE.3_2_CONTENT: All content posted by users should comply with platform regulations and must not contain obscene, violent, inciting, or other prohibited content.
USER_CODE.3_3_CONTENT: Users must not illegally collect, use, or disclose personal information of others and should respect the privacy of others.
USER_CODE.4_1_CONTENT: The platform reserves the right to review and delete any content that does not comply with this User Code of Conduct and to suspend or terminate the accounts of violators.
USER_CODE.4_2_CONTENT: If users discover any violations, they can report them using the platform's reporting function, and the platform will handle them accordingly.
USER_CODE.5_1_CONTENT: The platform is not responsible for any service interruptions caused by technical failures or other reasons but will strive to restore services as quickly as possible.
USER_CODE.5_2_CONTENT: Users are responsible for the content they post, and the platform is not legally responsible for user-posted content.
USER_CODE.6_1_CONTENT: Users not on a paid plan should note that their conversation content may be made public in discussion forums. The platform is not responsible for the use and management of public content, and users assume the risk of their content being made public.
USER_CODE.6_2_CONTENT: Users who choose a paid plan will have their conversation content kept private and will enjoy additional exclusive features and services provided by the platform.
USER_CODE.7_1_CONTENT: The platform reserves the right to modify this User Code of Conduct at any time, and the modified code will be published on the platform and take effect immediately.
USER_CODE.7_2_CONTENT: The platform reserves the right to immediately terminate the services of users who violate this User Code of Conduct.
USER_CODE.8_CONTENT: If users have any questions or suggestions regarding this User Code of Conduct, please contact us through the following methods:
USER_CODE.AGREE_BTN_2: , I confirm acceptance of the above terms.

CHAT.UPDATE_FOLDER_LINK_DESCRIPTION: A past version of this folder has already been shared. Manage previously shared folders via Settings.
CHAT.UPDATE_LINK_HINT: The public link to your chat has been created. Manage previously shared chats via Settings.
